thread.title: Just a reminder: We are always looking for futuristic concept art to feature on io9.
thread.title_full: Just a reminder: We are always looking for futuristic concept art to feature on io9.

author: io9 staff
title: Just a reminder: We are always looking for futuristic concept art to feature on io9.
text:
Go to permalink 
Just a reminder: We are always looking for futuristic concept art to feature on io9. Please email if you’d like us to showcase your art! You can also send news and info to that address. Also, check out our official user forum, Observation Deck . And please don’t forget to like us on Facebook ! Gear from Kinja Deals
